member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Navigation.ZoomContentControl.ResetView
member.summary: Resets the view to the default zoom level and center point.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Navigation.ZoomContentControl.StartPanDrag
member.summary: Starts a pan-drag operation, where the user can move the content along with the mouse.
member.remarks: The left, right, or middle mouse button must be pressed when this method is called. Once the operation is started, the end-user can pan the content until the mouse button is released.
member.exception: Neither the left, the right, or the middle mouse button is down.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Navigation.ZoomContentControl.StartZoomDrag
member.summary: Starts a zoom-drag operation, where the user can zoom-in by moving the mouse up and zoom-out by moving the mouse down.
member.remarks: The left, right, or middle mouse button must be pressed when this method is called. Once the operation is started, the end-user can zoom the content until the mouse button is released.
member.exception: Neither the left, the right, or the middle mouse button is down.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Navigation.ZoomContentControl.StartZoomIn
member.summary: Starts a zoom-in operation, where the user can continuously zoom-in by holding the mouse button down.
member.remarks: The left, right, or middle mouse button must be pressed when this method is called. Once the operation is started, the end-user can continuously zoom-in the content until the mouse button is released.
member.exception: Neither the left, the right, or the middle mouse button is down.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Navigation.ZoomContentControl.StartZoomOut
member.summary: Starts a zoom-out operation, where the user can continuously zoom-out by holding the mouse button down.
member.remarks: The left, right, or middle mouse button must be pressed when this method is called. Once the operation is started, the end-user can continuously zoom-out the content until the mouse button is released.
member.exception: Neither the left, the right, or the middle mouse button is down.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.Navigation.ZoomContentControl.StartZoomToRegion
member.summary: Starts a zoom-to-region operation, where the user can draw a rectangle over the content to indicate the desired region.
member.remarks: The left, right, or middle mouse button must be pressed when this method is called. Once the operation is started, the end-user can draw a rectangle over the content until the mouse button is released.
member.exception: Neither the left, the right, or the middle mouse button is down.
